title: [K-12] In-Depth Mathematics Concept Education Course Utilizing Rapid e-Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Operations and Understanding of Fundamental Mathematical Concepts
context.additional_context: Education focused on improving real-life problem-solving skills through Bloom’s taxonomy-based activities in smartphone-centered limited technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can solve real-life math problems step-by-step according to Bloom’s Taxonomy six-level framework.
Learners can visually and interactively reconstruct math concepts using smartphone-based e-learning tools.
Learners can produce outcomes that apply acquired math knowledge to real-world situations through project-based assessments.

resources: Printed Learning Materials with QR Codes
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
